QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Sha of Hatred
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a tranquil group and lead them into the Shado-Pan Monastery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and rescue Taran Zhu from the Sha of Hatred.$B$BReturn to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Shado-Pan Monastery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the Shado-Pan Monastery Challenge Mode
